Name: JOIN tiles - Anatolian game to play
About the game: JOIN tiles - Anatolian game to play is a puzzle game whose aim is to combine broken tiles. Our game, which offers a pleasant and fluent gameplay, contains the works of Anatolian Tile art of hundreds of years. There are 60 puzzles in three categories in our game. Thematic categories in our game Anatolian Kitty Cyber
